name: go
description: Go is an innovative, Gutenberg-first WordPress theme, hyper-focused on empowering makers to build beautifully rich websites with WordPress.

scripts.setup: composer install && npm install && npm run build
scripts.postbuild: rm -rf temp && mkdir temp && cp -a dist/* temp && NODE_ENV=development webpack --config .dev/config/webpack.dev.js && cp -a temp/* dist && rm -rf temp && .dev/deploy-scripts/tweak-css-files.sh && npm run makepot
scripts.postdev: mkdir temp && cp -a dist/* temp && NODE_ENV=production webpack --config .dev/config/webpack.prod.js && cp -a temp/* dist && rm -rf temp && .dev/deploy-scripts/tweak-css-files.sh
scripts.package: rm -rf build && mkdir -p build/go && npm run build && rsync -av --exclude-from .distignore --delete . build/go && cd build && zip -r go.zip ./go
scripts.preversion: git pull origin master && git reset --hard origin/master
scripts.postversion: git tag -d canary && git push && git push --tags
scripts.lint-release: npm install && composer install && npm run lint
scripts.makepot: wp i18n make-pot . languages/go.pot --skip-audit --exclude=build,dist --headers='{"Last-Translator":"plugins@godaddy.com","Report-Msgid-Bugs-To":"https://github.com/godaddy-wordpress/go/issues"}' --file-comment='Copyright (c) 2019 GoDaddy Operating Company, LLC. All Rights Reserved.' && npm run pot2json
scripts.json2po: cd languages && find . -name '*.json' ! -name 'go.json' -execdir /bin/bash -c 'FROM="$0" && TO="go-`basename $0 .json`.po" && echo "$FROM > $TO" && ../.dev/bin/json2po go.json $FROM $TO && msgmerge --previous $TO go.pot > $TO-msgmerge && mv $TO-msgmerge $TO && if [[ "$OSTYPE" == "darwin"* ]]; then sed -i "" -e "/^#, fuzzy$/d" $TO; else sed -i -e "/^#, fuzzy$/d" $TO; fi;' '{}' \;
scripts.po2mo: cd languages && find . -name '*.json' ! -name 'go.json' -execdir /bin/bash -c 'FROM="go-`basename $0 .json`.po" && TO="`basename $0 .json`.mo" && echo "$FROM > $TO" && msgfmt $FROM -o $TO' '{}'  \;
scripts.lint: npm run lint-css && npm run lint-js && npm run lint-php
scripts.test-vr: MOZ_HEADLESS_WIDTH=1920 MOZ_HEADLESS_HEIGHT=1080 npx cypress run --config video=false --spec '.dev/tests/cypress/integration/visual-regression/+(barista|bento|furnish|miller)-*.spec.js' --headless
scripts.test-vr-all: MOZ_HEADLESS_WIDTH=1920 MOZ_HEADLESS_HEIGHT=1080 npx cypress run --config video=false --spec '.dev/tests/cypress/integration/visual-regression/*.spec.js' --headless
